hero.title: Secure and Reliable Banking
hero.subtitle: Experience the future of banking with MiBnak. Enjoy seamless digital services, industry-leading security, and personalized support.

features.field1-text: Our platform uses the latest security technologies to ensure that your transactions are safe and secure.
features.field2-text: Keep track of your transactions and manage your finances with our easy-to-use dashboard.
features.field3-text: Access your account on the go with our mobile support. Check your balance, make transfers, and more.

converter.subtitle: Currency Converter
converter.title: Convert Currencies Easily
converter.main-text: Quickly and securely convert between different currencies with our advanced currency converter. Stay on top of exchange rates and make informed financial decisions.
converter.field1-text: Access up-to-date exchange rates for over 150 currencies.
converter.field2-text: Convert between currencies with just a few clicks.
converter.field3-text: Enjoy low fees on currency exchanges and transfers.
converter.field4-text: Our platform uses the latest security technologies to ensure that your transactions are safe and secure.

key-features.subtitle: Key Features
key-features.title: Banking Made Simple
key-features.main-text: MiBank Bank offers a range of features to help you manage your finances and make the most of your money. From secure transactions to real-time currency conversion, we have you covered.
key-features.field1-text: Manage your accounts, transfer funds, and pay bills anytime, anywhere.
key-features.field2-text: Enjoy seamless and secure digital payments with our advanced fraud protection.
key-features.field3-text: Get personalized insights and recommendations to help you make informed financial decisions.
key-features.field4-text: Our dedicated customer service team is available whenever you need us.

people-first.subtitle: People First
people-first.title: Putting People First
people-first.main-text: At MiBank Bank, we're committed to building a financial ecosystem that empowers our customers to achieve their goals. Our core values of integrity, innovation, and community guide everything we do.

customers.title: What Our Customers Say
customers.main-text: Hear from real people who have experienced the benefits of our modern banking services.

customer2.text: Incredibly user-friendly and secure. Love it!
customer2.name: Jane Smith

customer3.text: Hands down the best banking app I've used.
customer3.name: Alice Johnson

register.title: Crate an Account
register.subtitle: Start using our services today. Fill out the form and register.

login.subtitle: Log in to your account to access our services.
